name: Yellow: The Yellow Artifact
description:
Yellow - is a cool flat platformer, with adventure and puzzle elements.


Welcome to the Yellow, abstract platformer with vector graphics.
Different locations and enemies, great soundtrack and a lot of Steam features waiting you here! (achievements, trading cards, community, etc)
Relax during the game and enjoy juice gameplay.


  • Explore big game world
  • Enjoy graphics and soundtrack
  • Get cool emoticons, achievements and trading cards
